original_text: Then the man took me to the outside yard. He took me around the yard to see its four corners. In each corner I saw that there was a small yard
korean_text: 나를 데리고 바깥뜰로 나가서 나를 뜰 네 구석을 지나가게 하시는데 본즉 그 뜰 매 구석에 또 뜰이 있는데

sentences.original_text: Then the man took me to the outside yard
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 사람은 나를 바깥뜰로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He took me around the yard to see its four corners
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 네 모서리를 보도록 나를 뜰 주위로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: In each corner I saw that there was a small yard
sentences.korean_translation: 각 모서리에서 작은 뜰이 있는 것을 보았습니다
